introduction: GOJUMONG CASUAL is an authentic Korean barbecue restaurant situated on the 6th floor of LOTTE center. Operated since 2014, we’ve been well-known for a wide-range menu of savoury barbecue and cozy atmosphere, which is loved by not only locals but also foreigners. GOJUMONG is definitely the perfect place for enjoying premium cuts of marinated beef or pork to be char-grilled at your table along with a healthy assortment of banchan, bottomless Korean side dishes.
